title: Batman.Arkham.Knight.Steam.Preload.Unlocker-MERCS213
description:
How to use: 
DONT NOT USE ON ANY OTHER RELEASES EXCEPT MERCS213 PRELOAD
1. Extract "Preload.Unlocker.Files.zip"
2. Move the files located in the "Unlocker" folder to the depotcache folder that contains CSD/CSM files from MERCS213 preload release 
3. Run "unpack.bat" and wait for it to finish unpacking the files
4. Copy the "Binaries" folder to the newly created "Batman Arkham Knight" folder and overwrite
Note: The game has Denuvo DRM and is not cracked

Credits: 
sam2k8 for making the unlocker :)
